original_solution_mapping.L1: Out of the 40, 40 x 1/10 = <<40*1/10=4>>4 students are absent.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So, 40 - 4 = <<40-4=36>>36 students are present in school.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Out of the 36, 36 x 3/4 = <<36*3/4=27>>27 students are in the classroom.
original_solution_mapping.L4: This means, 36 - 27 = <<36-27=9>>9 students are in the canteen.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 133.
    Returns: the number of students in the canteen.
    """
    # L1
    total_students = 40 # 40 students in a class
    absent_fraction = Fraction(1, 10) # 1/10 are absent
    absent_students = total_students * absent_fraction

    # L2
    present_students = total_students - absent_students

    # L3
    classroom_fraction = Fraction(3, 4) # 3/4 of the students who are present are in the classroom
    classroom_students = present_students * classroom_fraction

    # L4
    canteen_students = present_students - classroom_students

    # FA
    answer = canteen_students
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Out of the {total_students}, {total_students} x {absent_fraction} = <<{total_students}*{absent_fraction}={absent_students}>>{absent_students} students are absent.
So, {total_students} - {absent_students} = <<{total_students}-{absent_students}={present_students}>>{present_students} students are present in school.
Out of the {present_students}, {present_students} x {classroom_fraction} = <<{present_students}*{classroom_fraction}={classroom_students}>>{classroom_students} students are in the classroom.
This means, {present_students} - {classroom_students} = <<{present_students}-{classroom_students}={canteen_students}>>{canteen_students} students are in the canteen.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Out of the 40, 40 x 1/10 = <<40*1/10=4>>4 students are absent.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So, 40 - 4 = <<40-4=36>>36 students are present in school.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Out of the 4, 4 x 3/4 = <<4*3/4=3>>3 students are in the classroom.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: This means, 36 - 3 = <<36-3=33>>33 students are in the canteen.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'absent_students' (value: 4) was used instead of 'present_students' (value: 36).
